name: apikey-authorizer
description: lambda per verificare lo stato della Api Key proveniente dal client dell’API, decodificare il “cliente”, aggiungere eventuali attributi dell’utente collegati alla API Key impostati come header nelle chiamate ai micro-servizi

scripts.test-build: npm run-script test && npm run-script coverage && npm run-script sonar && npm run-script build
scripts.build:single: npm prune --production && rm -f ./function.zip && npm run-script zip:full
scripts.build:multiLayer: rm -rf nodejs && mkdir -p nodejs && npm prune --production  && cp -Lrf node_modules nodejs && rm -f ./code_layer.zip && npm run-script zip:code && rm -f ./lib_layer.zip && npm run-script zip:libs
scripts.build: npm run-script build:single && npm run-script build:multiLayer
